item.description:
The wildest night of the year to go out. And we're doing it in style (because is there any other way?)


This is a Thanksgiving Eve party in downtown New Haven. This may be deemed the party of all parties. Here's the gist:


-There is an open bar from 8-10. Yeah, that's all you can drink for TWO hours. Giddy up!


-Jager girls are in the building (this time for sure), doing giveaways.


-I will be Djing as well as DJ Chris (we're back baby). Music will be off the hook.


-There will be glow in the dark sunglasses given out, so you can wear them at night (just like the song). Why? Because that's how we party - in style.


-Our meetup group will receive a VIP booth to hang out in.


-There will be glowsticks.


-A professional photographer will be on scene taking pictures of all the cool and sexy ppl - us.


-Cover will be $5.


-This is taking place at the Lazy Lizard in downtown New Haven from 8pm-2am.


-Yes, bring friends.


Yeah it's pretty action packed. Come by.


Let this get you in the mood meanwhile:
item.name: I Wear My Sunglasses at Night - Thanksgiving Eve Party!
